name: NOVETHIC
goal:
Novethic calls itself “Sustainable Transformation Accelerator”: As an expert in sustainable finance and a reference media for economics, business & sustainability, Novethic combines approaches to offer financial players, companies and their employees the keys to a sustainable transformation. Our mission is to spread a sustainable culture among finance and business professionals, to empower decision-makers and facilitate their action. Founded in 2001, Novethic is a subsidiary of the Caisse des Dépôts Group and has 6 main activities.
-A webmedia with 15 million views by year in French and English which decode the news, trends and debate of sustainable economy
-Surveys in French and English about best practices of Sustainable Finance
-Trainings for financial sector about Sustainable Finance
-An Asset Owner Network to join French community of committed investors
-Positive Investors Forum: A European Annual meeting to dare sustainable transformation
-Auditor of GreenFin Label, public French Label for green financial products
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Communication, Consumers, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Taxation
